ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors thank the large number of people who assisted them in sample collection, Fiona R. Savory for language editing, and Amritendu Mukhopadhayay, Arjun Shivsundar, Balaji Chattopadhyay, Kritika M. Garg, Siddhartha Chaudhuri, Suhel Quader, and Uma Ramakrishnan for critical comments on this manuscript. Extensive computational resources were provided by the Bioportal at the University of Oslo, Norway ( http://www.bioportal.uio.no).
